query.statement: MERGE INTO SAPHEE.ZPSTW0304_TOT3 AS TGT USING ( SELECT T.MANDT, T.PSPID, T.POSID, #INP_DT# AS INP_DT, -- BY ISH Æ®·£Àè¼Ç Å° (ÀÏÀÚ) SUM(T.PRO_R) AS PRO_R FROM ( SELECT Z.MANDT, Z.PSPID, Z.POSID, Z.PRONR, P.PRO_R FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTW0304 AS Z LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS A ON A.MANDT = Z.MANDT AND A.POSID = Z.PSPID AND A.POSID_1 = Z.POSID --Æ®·£Àè¼Ç Å° Ã³¸® Ãß°¡ - 2019.03.05 °­¹Î¼®K --AND Z.INP_DT < '20181106' AND Z.INP_DT <= #INP_DT# LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0111 AS P ON A.MANDT = P.MANDT AND A.TYPE = P.TYPE AND A.VER = P.VER AND A.ZZGUBUN = P.GUBUN AND P.PRONR = Z.PRONR WHERE Z.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND Z.PSPID = #PSPID# -- BY ISH Æ®·£Àè¼Ç Å° AND Z.POSID = #POSID# -- BY ISH Æ®·£Àè¼Ç Å° --AND A.LIFNR = #LIFNR#-- BY ISH Æ®·£Àè¼Ç Å° --AND A.TEMNO2 = #TEMNO2#-- BY ISH Æ®·£Àè¼Ç Å° AND A.ZZGUBUN BETWEEN '10' AND '14' AND A.PRART IN ('01', '02', '11') AND A.ZZCHAKG = 'X' AND A.TXT04 <> 'C' GROUP BY Z.MANDT, Z.PSPID, Z.POSID, Z.PRONR, P.PRO_R ) T WHERE T.MANDT = #G_MANDT# GROUP BY T.MANDT, T.PSPID, T.POSID ) AS SRC ON TGT.MANDT = SRC.MANDT AND TGT.PSPID = SRC.PSPID AND TGT.POSID = SRC.POSID AND TGT.INP_DT = SRC.INP_DT WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (MANDT, PSPID, POSID, INP_DT, PRO_SUM) VALUES (SRC.MANDT, SRC.PSPID, SRC.POSID, #INP_DT#, SRC.PRO_R) -- BY ISH Æ®·£Àè¼Ç Å° (ÀÏÀÚ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET TGT.PRO_SUM = SRC.PRO_R
